content: three quick hats are classic style beanies designed with speed and simplicity in mind two adult sizes are given with options for different ribbings and colour combinations for the body follow each hat as it is written or pick and mix different ribbings and colour styles **sizes ** s/m to fit 53-56cm / 21-22 head circumference l/xl to fit 56-60cm / 22-23 5 head circumference **gauge ** 24 stitches and 34 rounds = 10 x 10cm / 4 x 4 with 4mm us 6 needles in stockinette stitch knit in the round **needles ** 3 5mm us 4 and 4mm us 6 circular needles or dpns to work in the round **materials ** approx 60 70 g in total of dk weight yarn the samples are knit using the wool barn extrafine merino dk 85% extrafine superwash merino 15% nylon 225m / 246yds per 100g 1 http //www ravelry com/purchase/the-wool-barn/840223
